stanford.cs106.io

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • stanford.cs106.io.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods related to file processing and I/O.

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public static void copy(File in,
                        File out)
        Copies the entire contents of the given in file into the given out file.

      • getCurrentDirectory

        public static String getCurrentDirectory()
        The directory in which the current app is running.

      • getExpectedInputDirectory

        public static File getExpectedInputDirectory()
        Returns a directory that is likely to contain expected input files for a running Stanford lib project. Checks in subfolders of the current directory such as input/, expected-output/, etc.

      • getExpectedOutputDirectory

        public static File getExpectedOutputDirectory()
        Returns a directory that is likely to contain expected output files for a running Stanford lib project. Checks in subfolders of the current directory such as output/, expected-output/, etc.

      • getExtension

        public static String getExtension(File file)
        The file name extension (such as mp3, doc, txt) of the given file's name.
        Returns:
        null if the file is null, or "" if the file has no extension

      • getExtension

        public static String getExtension(String fileName)
        The file name extension (such as mp3, doc, txt) of the given file's name.
        Returns:
        null if the file is null, or "" if the file has no extension

      • getFileName

        public static String getFileName(String filePath)
        Strips folders from file's name. Like basename in Perl/PHP. e.g. "foo/bar/Baz.java" returns "Baz.java"

      • getFolder

        public static String getFolder(String fileName)
        The folder name of the given file path. e.g. "foo/bar/Baz.java" returns "foo/bar/" PRE: no folders in fileName (no "foo/bar/Baz.java")

      • getTempFolder

        public static String getTempFolder()
        The full path to the server's temp directory, such as "/tmp/foobar/".

      • readEntireFile

        public static String readEntireFile(File file)
        Reads the given file's text fully and returns it as a String.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if file cannot be read

        public static String readEntireFile(String fileName)
        Reads the given file's text fully and returns it as a String.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if file cannot be read

        IOException - if stream cannot be read

        Reads the full text from the given file, and returns it as an array of bytes.
        Throws:
        IOException - if stream cannot be read

      • toInputStream

        public static InputStream toInputStream(String data)
        Creates and returns an input stream to read the characters of the given string as bytes, one character at a time.

      • redirectInput

        public static void redirectInput(String data)
        Redirects System.in to pull input data from the text in the given string.

      • redirectOutput

        public static ByteArrayOutputStream redirectOutput()
        Redirects System.out to a byte array output stream, which is returned. Also sets a limit on the amount of output that can be produced before an ExcessiveOutputException will occur (so students can't infinitely println).

      • redirectOutput

        public static ByteArrayOutputStream redirectOutput(boolean limit)
        Redirects System.out to a byte array output stream, which is returned.
        Parameters:
        limit - if true, sets a limit on the amount of output that can be produced before an ExcessiveOutputException will occur (so students can't infinitely println).

      • removeExtension

        public static String removeExtension(String fileName)
        Removes the file's extension; e.g. "foobar.mp3" returns "foobar"

      • removeFolder

        public static String removeFolder(String fileName)
        Removes any leading folders from the given file name; e.g. "foo/bar/Baz.java" returns "Baz.java"

      • stopRedirectingInput

        public static void stopRedirectingInput()
        Sets System.in back to its original state.

      • stopRedirectingOutput

        public static void stopRedirectingOutput()
        Sets System.out/err back to their original state.

      • writeEntireFile

        public static void writeEntireFile(String text,
                                   String fileName)
        Writes the given text into the file with the given name, replacing any existing text.

      • writeEntireFile

        public static void writeEntireFile(String text,
                                   File file)
        Writes the given text into the given file, replacing any existing text.

        public static void writeBytes(byte[] bytes,
                              String fileName)
        Writes the given bytes into the given file, replacing any existing content.
